AI Agent that handles engineering tasks end-to-end: integrates with developersâ€™ tools, plans, executes, and iterates until it achieves a successful result.

Refact - Open Sourced AI Software Development Agent

Refact Agent is a free, open-source AI Agent that handles engineering tasks end-to-end. It deeply understands your codebases and integrates with your tools, databases, and browsers to automate complex, multi-step tasks.

ğŸš€ Seamless Integration with Your Workflow

Refact Agent works effortlessly with the tools and databases you already use:

  • ğŸ—„ï¸ Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL
  • ğŸ› ï¸ Debugging: Pdb
  • ğŸ³ Containerization: Docker

  • âœ… Deploy On-Premise: Maintain 100% control over your codebase.
  • ğŸ§  Access State-of-the-Art Models: Supports Claude 3.7 Sonnet, GPT-4o, o3-mini, and more.
  • ğŸ”‘ Bring Your Own Key (BYOK): Use your own API keys for external LLMs.
  • ğŸ’¬ Integrated IDE Chat: Stay in your workflow, no need to switch between tools!
  • âš¡ Free, Unlimited, Context-Aware Auto-Completion: Code faster with smart AI suggestions.
  • ğŸ› ï¸ Supports 25+ Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript, Java, Rust, TypeScript, PHP, C++, C#, Go, and many more!

ğŸš€ Core Features and Functionality

âœ… Unlimited accurate auto-completion with context awareness â€“ Powered by Qwen2.5-Coder-1.5B, utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

âœ… Integrated in-IDE Chat â€“ AI deeply understands your code and provides relevant, intelligent answers.

âœ… Integrated with Tools â€“ Works with GitHub, GitLab, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Pdb, Docker, and shell commands.

âœ… State-of-the-Art Models â€“ Supports Claude 3.7 Sonnet, GPT-4o, o3-mini, and more.

âœ… Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) â€“ Use your own API keys for external LLMs.

ğŸ¤– Which Tasks Can Refact Help You With?

  • ğŸ— Generate code from natural language prompts (even with typos).

  • ğŸ”„ Refactor code for better quality and readability.

  • ğŸ“– Explain code to quickly understand unfamiliar code.

  • ğŸ Debug code to detect and fix errors faster.

  • ğŸ§ª Generate unit tests for reliable code.

  • ğŸ“Œ Code Review with AI-assisted suggestions.

  • ğŸ“œ Create Documentation to keep knowledge up to date.

  • ğŸ· Generate Docstrings for structured documentation.

âš™ï¸ QuickStart

You can install the Refact repository without Docker:

pip install .

For GPU with CUDA capability >= 8.0 and flash-attention v2 support:

FLASH_ATTENTION_FORCE_BUILD=TRUE MAX_JOBS=4 INSTALL_OPTIONAL=TRUE pip install .

ğŸ³ Running Refact Self-Hosted in a Docker Container

The easiest way to run the self-hosted server is using a pre-built Docker image.
See CONTRIBUTING.md for installation without a Docker container.

ğŸ”Œ Getting Started with Plugins

  1. Download Refact for VS Code or JetBrains.
  2. Set up a custom inference URL: 
    http://127.0.0.1:8008
  3. Configure the plugin settings:
    • JetBrains: Settings > Tools > Refact.ai > Advanced > Inference URL
    • VSCode: Extensions > Refact.ai Assistant > Settings > Address URL

ğŸ“– Documentation

For detailed guidance and best practices, check out our documentation.

Want to contribute to our project? We're always open to new ideas and features!

  • Read our Contributing Guide â€“ Check out Contributing.md to get started.

Your contributions help shape the future of Refact Agent! ğŸš€
